segments.text: In this drawing, I see the woman facing away from the chaos, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, and water's cascading over the sink's edge relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor, threatening to ruin the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there unaware, one foot wet, which tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing the unstable stool to the cookie jar, so dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stretch looks effortful, with the stool tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's below, hand raised in hopeful wait for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules sneakily, but it feels innocently fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's view of the calm garden contrasts the indoor worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes wait on the counter, part of this disrupted routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang seeing potential for tears if things go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed mischief and mess just makes me melancholy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
